TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputBinding extends System.Web.Services.Description.MessageBinding

Docs.summary: Provides a set of specifications for data formats and protocols used by the XML Web service for input messages. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `InputBinding` class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<input>` element enclosed by the `<operation>` element, which in turn corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.OperationBinding> class. For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `InputBinding` class.
[!code-cs[DescriptionNamespaceSample1#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.de_2_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[DescriptionNamespaceSample1#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.de_2_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[DescriptionNamespaceSample1#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.de_2_1.vb)]
